wikipedia_page.main: James Lloyd  (born 1861) was a Welsh international footballer. He was part of the Wales national football team, playing 1 match on 7 April 1879 against Scotland.At club level, he played for Wrexham and Newtown.

*James Lloyd, convicted British serial rapist known as the Rotherham shoe rapist
